masthead.lead: More about me? Just scroll down.

jelleglebbeek.title: jelleglebbeek.com
jelleglebbeek.text: The site you are on right now, with some information about me and the projects I work on.

galeriewijna.title: Galeriewijna.nl
galeriewijna.text: A simple but good looking website where paintings that are up for sale get showcased.

walksimulator.title: Walk Simulator
walksimulator.text: A Java LJWGL 3D game I programmed for a school project. Fun fact, this was made with a broken right arm.

ytdlgui.title: youtube-dl-gui
ytdlgui.text: An easy to use program to download YouTube videos and playlists blazingly fast, with a lot of customisation.

gm4.title: GameMode 4
gm4.text: A minecraft plugin derived from the popular GM4 datapacks which adds tons of new features to the game.

squidwards.title: Sir. Squidwards
squidwards.text: My very own setup where I spend most of my days. The name obviously comes from Spongebob (don't ask why).
